item.title: Interactive Plotting With Python: From Zero to Hero ðŸš€
item.description: Static data reporting is great when we want the user to focus on a specific view or behavior of the data. However, it can be limiting when the data is too complex or when we want to share different perspectives at the same time. Interactive data sharing enables data discovery, giving users freedom to delve into the data, create their own contexts and discover new patterns and relationships that were not pre-established.
